landingpage.undertitel: Kammarslusen Ribe – a payment system for ships in Ribe. It is a system that makes it easy for ships to pay to pass through the lock, and it also makes it easy for the lock to keep track of which ships have paid and which have not.
landingpage.section1Content: Kammarslusen Ribe is a payment system for ships in Ribe. It is a system that makes it easy for ships to pay to pass through the lock, and it also makes it easy for the lock to keep track of which ships have paid and which have not.
